text: Over the Brooklyn Bridge is a 1984 American romantic comedy movie directed by Menahem Golan. It stars Elliott Gould, Margaux Hemingway, Sid Caesar, Burt Young, Shelley Winters, Carol Kane, Robert Gossett and Sarah Michelle Gellar. It was distributed by MGM. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Menahem Golan Category:Movies set in Brooklyn Category:Movies about Jews and Judaism
title: Over the Brooklyn Bridge
